name: Card 'Em
description:
You're losing money. Quick, throw your business cards at random people!

The game is endless. You lose if you run out of cash AND cards. You get cash for every person you hit with a card, and you get a chance to gain a customer. After a while, customers start increasing by word of mouth.

Your goal is to get as many customers as possible before you run out of cards and money.

This game was made by me for the Weekly Game Jam 58, with the theme being cards.
